title: Culture & Traditions
description: Learn vocabulary for discussing culture, customs, celebrations, and traditions.

words.meaning: a custom or belief passed down through generations
words.example: It's a tradition in my family to eat together on Sundays.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리 가족은 일요일에 함께 식사하는 전통이 있어요.

words.meaning: a traditional way of behaving
words.example: Bowing is a common custom in Korea.
words.exampleTranslation: 절을 하는 것은 한국의 흔한 관습이에요.

words.meaning: a formal event for a special occasion
words.example: The wedding ceremony was beautiful.
words.exampleTranslation: 결혼식이 아름다웠어요.

words.meaning: a special day or period of celebration
words.example: The music festival attracts thousands of visitors.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 음악 축제는 수천 명의 방문객을 끌어들여요.

words.meaning: traditions, buildings, etc. from the past
words.example: We should protect our cultural heritage.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 문화 유산을 보호해야 해요.

words.meaning: a person from your family who lived long ago
words.example: My ancestors came from a small village.
words.exampleTranslation: 제 조상들은 작은 마을에서 왔어요.

words.meaning: the act of celebrating a special event
words.example: The New Year celebration lasts for several days.
words.exampleTranslation: 새해 기념 행사는 며칠 동안 계속돼요.

words.meaning: relating to religion
words.example: Many holidays have religious origins.
words.exampleTranslation: 많은 명절이 종교적 기원을 가지고 있어요.

words.meaning: a set of actions performed in a fixed order
words.example: Tea ceremonies are important rituals in Japan.
words.exampleTranslation: 다도는 일본에서 중요한 의례예요.

words.meaning: something that represents something else
words.example: The dragon is a symbol of power in many Asian cultures.
words.exampleTranslation: 용은 많은 아시아 문화에서 힘의 상징이에요.

words.meaning: following customs from the past
words.example: She wore traditional Korean clothing to the event.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 행사에 전통 한복을 입었어요.

words.meaning: to keep something in its original state
words.example: It's important to preserve traditional crafts.
words.exampleTranslation: 전통 공예를 보존하는 것이 중요해요.

words.meaning: including many different cultures
words.example: London is a multicultural city.
words.exampleTranslation: 런던은 다문화 도시예요.

words.meaning: showing a great deal of variety
words.example: The region has a diverse population.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 지역은 다양한 인구 구성을 가지고 있어요.

words.meaning: a style of cooking from a particular place
words.example: Korean cuisine is becoming popular worldwide.
words.exampleTranslation: 한국 요리가 전 세계적으로 인기를 얻고 있어요.

words.meaning: relating to a particular cultural group
words.example: The festival celebrates ethnic diversity.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 축제는 민족적 다양성을 기념해요.

words.meaning: relating to traditional culture of ordinary people
words.example: Folk music tells stories about everyday life.
words.exampleTranslation: 민속 음악은 일상 생활에 대한 이야기를 들려줘요.

words.meaning: clothes typical of a particular place or time
words.example: People wore traditional costumes at the parade.
words.exampleTranslation: 사람들이 퍼레이드에서 전통 의상을 입었어요.

words.meaning: a belief not based on reason or science
words.example: In some cultures, breaking a mirror is a superstition.
words.exampleTranslation: 어떤 문화에서는 거울을 깨는 것이 미신이에요.

words.meaning: friendly treatment of guests
words.example: Korean hospitality is famous around the world.
words.exampleTranslation: 한국의 환대는 전 세계적으로 유명해요.

words.meaning: to show respect for; great respect
words.example: We honor our elders in our culture.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리 문화에서는 어른을 공경해요.

words.meaning: the power to affect others
words.example: Western culture has influenced fashion worldwide.
words.exampleTranslation: 서양 문화가 전 세계 패션에 영향을 미쳤어요.

words.meaning: who a person or group is
words.example: Culture plays a big role in forming our identity.
words.exampleTranslation: 문화는 우리 정체성을 형성하는 데 큰 역할을 해요.

words.meaning: the process of becoming worldwide
words.example: Globalization has made cultures more connected.
words.exampleTranslation: 세계화로 인해 문화들이 더 연결되었어요.

words.meaning: a fixed, oversimplified idea about a group
words.example: We should avoid cultural stereotypes.
words.exampleTranslation: 문화적 고정관념을 피해야 해요.

words.meaning: something left by people from the past
words.example: The temple is a legacy of ancient civilization.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 사원은 고대 문명의 유산이에요.

words.meaning: to remember and honor someone or something
words.example: We commemorate the war heroes every year.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 매년 전쟁 영웅들을 기념해요.

words.meaning: traditional stories and beliefs of a community
words.example: Korean folklore includes many interesting stories.
words.exampleTranslation: 한국 민속에는 많은 흥미로운 이야기가 포함되어 있어요.

words.meaning: a structure built to remember a person or event
words.example: The monument honors those who died in the war.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 기념비는 전쟁에서 사망한 사람들을 기리고 있어요.

words.meaning: a journey to a sacred place
words.example: Many people make a pilgrimage to holy sites.
words.exampleTranslation: 많은 사람들이 성지로 순례를 떠나요.

words.meaning: connected with religion; holy
words.example: This mountain is sacred to the local people.
words.exampleTranslation: 이 산은 지역 주민들에게 신성해요.

words.meaning: native to a particular place
words.example: Indigenous people have unique cultural traditions.
words.exampleTranslation: 원주민들은 독특한 문화적 전통을 가지고 있어요.

words.meaning: something forbidden by social custom
words.example: In some cultures, certain topics are taboo.
words.exampleTranslation: 어떤 문화에서는 특정 주제가 금기예요.

words.meaning: polite ways of behaving in society
words.example: Good table manners are important in formal dinners.
words.exampleTranslation: 정식 만찬에서는 좋은 식탁 예절이 중요해요.

words.meaning: rules of polite behavior in society
words.example: Business etiquette differs from country to country.
words.exampleTranslation: 비즈니스 예절은 나라마다 달라요.

words.meaning: showing love for your country
words.example: Singing the national anthem is a patriotic act.
words.exampleTranslation: 국가를 부르는 것은 애국적인 행위예요.

words.meaning: peaceful agreement and cooperation
words.example: Cultural harmony helps society function well.
words.exampleTranslation: 문화적 조화는 사회가 잘 작동하도록 도와요.

words.meaning: the state of being united or joined as a whole
words.example: The festival promotes unity among different cultures.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 축제는 다양한 문화들 사이의 단결을 촉진해요.

words.meaning: to show respect and love for a god
words.example: People worship in different ways around the world.
words.exampleTranslation: 사람들은 전 세계에서 다양한 방식으로 예배를 드려요.

words.meaning: a prayer asking for God's favor or protection
words.example: The priest gave a blessing to the newlyweds.
words.exampleTranslation: 신부님이 신혼부부에게 축복을 주었어요.

words.meaning: a traditional story often about gods or heroes
words.example: Greek myths are studied around the world.
words.exampleTranslation: 그리스 신화는 전 세계에서 연구되고 있어요.

words.meaning: a traditional story from the past
words.example: The legend of King Arthur is very famous.
words.exampleTranslation: 아서 왕의 전설은 매우 유명해요.

words.meaning: spoken rather than written
words.example: Oral traditions pass stories down through generations.
words.exampleTranslation: 구전 전통은 세대를 거쳐 이야기를 전달해요.

words.meaning: a form of a language spoken in a particular area
words.example: Each region has its own dialect.
words.exampleTranslation: 각 지역은 자체 방언을 가지고 있어요.

words.meaning: a social group with shared culture and ancestry
words.example: Many tribes have their own languages and customs.
words.exampleTranslation: 많은 부족들이 자체 언어와 관습을 가지고 있어요.

words.meaning: relating to a colony or colonialism
words.example: Colonial architecture can still be seen in the city.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 도시에서는 여전히 식민지 건축물을 볼 수 있어요.

words.meaning: a group of countries ruled by one authority
words.example: The Roman Empire influenced many cultures.
words.exampleTranslation: 로마 제국은 많은 문화에 영향을 미쳤어요.

words.meaning: a series of rulers from the same family
words.example: The Joseon Dynasty lasted for over 500 years.
words.exampleTranslation: 조선 왕조는 500년 이상 지속되었어요.

words.meaning: the period when a king or queen rules
words.example: During his reign, the country prospered.
words.exampleTranslation: 그의 통치 기간 동안 나라가 번영했어요.

words.meaning: a long period of history marked by particular events
words.example: The Victorian era was a time of great change.
words.exampleTranslation: 빅토리아 시대는 큰 변화의 시기였어요.

exercises.question: It's a _____ in my country to give red envelopes on New Year.
The wedding _____ took place in a beautiful garden.
Korean _____ includes dishes like kimchi and bibimbap.
The dragon is a _____ of luck in Chinese culture.
Many cities are becoming more _____ with people from different backgrounds.
We should _____ our cultural traditions for future generations.
_____ music and dance are important parts of our heritage.
_____ has connected cultures around the world through trade and technology.
We should avoid cultural _____ and learn about cultures directly.
The ancient palace is a _____ of the royal family.
We _____ our independence day every year with a parade.
_____ includes traditional stories and beliefs of a community.
The _____ was built to remember those who died in battle.
Many religious people make a _____ to visit holy places.
This temple is _____ to the Buddhist community.
_____ people have lived in this area for thousands of years.
Discussing politics at dinner is considered a _____ in some families.
Good _____ are essential when dining with important clients.
Wedding _____ varies greatly between different cultures.
The elder gave his _____ to the young couple.
Greek _____ tell stories about gods and heroes.
The _____ of Robin Hood has been told for centuries.
_____ traditions pass knowledge through speaking, not writing.
Each region speaks a different _____ of the same language.
The indigenous _____ has its own unique customs.
The building shows _____ architecture from the 1800s.
The Roman _____ spread across Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The Joseon _____ ruled Korea for over 500 years.
We need to _____ traditional crafts before they disappear.
Western fashion has had a strong _____ on Asian style.
Our cultural _____ shapes how we see the world.
The _____ community includes people from many different backgrounds.
Different _____ groups celebrate unique festivals.
Dancers wore colorful _____ for the traditional performance.
Many cultures have _____ about black cats.
We must _____ our war heroes who sacrificed their lives.
그 축제는 전통 문화를 기념합니다.
My ancestors lived in this village for many generations.
exercises.answer: 제 조상들은 여러 세대 동안 이 마을에 살았어요.

exercises.question: The tea ceremony is an important _____ in Japanese culture.
Flags and anthems are important national _____.
Many holidays have _____ origins and meanings.
She wore _____ dress to the cultural event.
우리는 문화 유산을 보호해야 합니다.
exercises.answer: We should protect our cultural heritage.

exercises.question: Korean hospitality is famous throughout the world.
During his _____, the king built many temples.
The Victorian _____ was a time of industrial progress.
The memorial service will _____ the victims of the disaster.
Thousands of people visit the _____ to holy sites each year.
많은 관습이 세대를 거쳐 전해집니다.
exercises.answer: Many customs are passed down through generations.

exercises.question: The festival attracts visitors from all over the world.
exercises.answer: 그 축제는 전 세계에서 방문객을 끌어들입니다.

exercises.question: Mountains are considered _____ in many cultures.
_____ peoples have lived here since ancient times.
In some cultures, certain foods are _____.
Learning proper _____ is important in business.
그 기념비는 전쟁 영웅들을 기립니다.
Good manners show respect for others.
exercises.answer: 좋은 예의는 다른 사람에 대한 존중을 보여줍니다.

exercises.question: Singing the national anthem is a _____ act.
Cultural _____ helps different groups live together peacefully.
The event promotes _____ among different communities.
People _____ their gods in different ways.
신부님이 신혼부부에게 축복을 주었습니다.
exercises.answer: The priest gave a blessing to the newlyweds.

exercises.question: Greek myths are studied in schools around the world.
exercises.answer: 그리스 신화는 전 세계 학교에서 공부됩니다.

exercises.question: Each region speaks its own _____.
The indigenous _____ has preserved its traditions for centuries.

pairs.match: group of countries under one rule
series of rulers from same family

exercises.question: The old building shows _____ architecture from the past.
The Roman _____ lasted for hundreds of years.
조선 왕조는 한국을 500년 이상 통치했습니다.
exercises.answer: The Joseon Dynasty ruled Korea for over 500 years.

exercises.question: Oral traditions pass stories through generations by speaking.
exercises.answer: 구전 전통은 말로 세대를 거쳐 이야기를 전달합니다.

exercises.question: _____ has made the world more connected.
We should challenge cultural _____ and learn the truth.
Our cultural _____ makes us who we are.
Italian _____ is famous for pasta and pizza.
다양한 문화는 사회를 풍요롭게 만듭니다.
The festival celebrates ethnic diversity.
_____ art is passed down from generation to generation.
The dancers wore beautiful traditional _____ for the show.
Some people believe in _____ about lucky numbers.
Korean _____ means treating guests with great respect.
우리는 어른을 공경하는 것이 중요합니다.
exercises.answer: It's important to honor our elders.

exercises.question: Western culture has influenced many Asian countries.
exercises.answer: 서양 문화는 많은 아시아 국가에 영향을 미쳤습니다.

exercises.question: The ancient temple is part of our cultural _____.
My _____ came to this country over 200 years ago.
The New Year _____ includes fireworks and music.
Many holidays have _____ significance and meaning.
차 의식은 일본에서 중요한 의례입니다.
exercises.answer: The tea ceremony is an important ritual in Japan.

exercises.question: The dragon is a symbol of power in many cultures.
Museums work to _____ artifacts from ancient times.
Toronto is a very _____ city with people from all over the world.
The region has a _____ population with many different languages.
French _____ is considered one of the finest in the world.
민속 음악은 우리 문화의 중요한 부분입니다.
exercises.answer: Folk music is an important part of our culture.

exercises.question: Traditional costumes are worn during special festivals.
exercises.answer: 전통 의상은 특별한 축제 때 입습니다.

exercises.question: The museum displays _____ artifacts from different cultures.
Stories and songs are part of _____ tradition.
Walking under a ladder is considered bad luck in some _____.
Visitors often comment on the warm _____ of the local people.
그 나라는 독립 영웅들을 기립니다.
exercises.answer: The country honors its independence heroes.

exercises.question: Social media has influenced modern culture significantly.
exercises.answer: 소셜 미디어는 현대 문화에 크게 영향을 미쳤습니다.

exercises.question: Language is an important part of our cultural _____.
_____ has brought cultures closer together.
The palace is a _____ from the imperial era.
A statue was built to _____ the founding of the city.
한국 민속에는 흥미로운 이야기가 많습니다.
exercises.answer: Korean folklore has many interesting stories.

exercises.question: The monument stands in the center of the city.
exercises.answer: 그 기념비는 도시 중심에 서 있습니다.

exercises.question: Many people make a _____ to Mecca every year.
This mountain is _____ to the local community.
_____ peoples have their own languages and traditions.
In many Asian cultures, showing your feet is a _____.
좋은 식탁 예절은 중요합니다.
Business etiquette is different in each country.
Waving the flag is a _____ gesture.
Living in _____ is important for a peaceful society.
The celebration promotes _____ among all citizens.
Christians _____ in churches on Sundays.
그리스 신화는 흥미진진한 이야기를 담고 있습니다.
The legend has been told for hundreds of years.
exercises.answer: 그 전설은 수백 년 동안 전해졌습니다.

exercises.question: _____ history is passed down by speaking, not writing.
The southern _____ sounds quite different from the northern one.
The Amazon is home to many indigenous _____.
The city has many _____ buildings from the 19th century.
로마 제국은 유럽 전역을 지배했습니다.
exercises.answer: The Roman Empire ruled across Europe.

exercises.question: The Ming Dynasty built the Forbidden City.
The Ottoman _____ lasted for over 600 years.
The Tang _____ was a golden age in Chinese history.
Queen Elizabeth II had the longest _____ in British history.
The medieval _____ was a time of castles and knights.
그 시대는 큰 변화의 시기였습니다.
exercises.answer: That era was a time of great change.

exercises.question: Cultural harmony helps society function smoothly.
exercises.answer: 문화적 조화는 사회가 원활하게 작동하도록 돕습니다.

exercises.question: We should _____ cultural diversity in our communities.
The ancient ruins are part of our historical _____.
Many cultures have interesting _____ about creation.
Respecting local _____ is important when traveling abroad.
전통 의식은 세대를 거쳐 전해집니다.
exercises.answer: Traditional rituals are passed down through generations.

exercises.question: Learning about different cultures broadens our perspective.
exercises.answer: 다양한 문화에 대해 배우는 것은 우리의 시야를 넓혀줍니다.

exercises.question: Traditional _____ are performed at the annual festival.
Understanding cultural _____ helps us communicate better internationally.
